sentences.english: Kim is left in the basement with the dead bodies.
sentences.chinese: 金姆被留在地下室，和那两具父女的尸体一起。

sentences.english: The Musas’ deaths, he predicted, would become just another statistic.
sentences.chinese: 他推测，穆萨父女之死只不过是又一统计数据罢了。

sentences.english: I wonder aloud whether his relationship with his daughter will inform his female characters.
sentences.chinese: 我想知道父女关系有没有唤起他女性的一面。

sentences.english: Estrangement between father and daughter never had, and we can talk about anything.
sentences.chinese: 父女之间从未有过隔阂，我们无话不谈。

sentences.english: Could they mediate a decade of emptiness between him and her?
sentences.chinese: 可书能填补他们父女之间的空白吗？

sentences.english: Jobs denied paternity of his daughter Lisa for years.
sentences.chinese: 乔布斯曾多年不承认与Lisa的父女关系。
我们父女俩在一起成长。

sentences.english: They had no mercy on they poor father and daughter.
sentences.chinese: 他们不怜悯这可怜的父女俩。

sentences.english: Now father and daughter stood looking at the young green leaves.
sentences.chinese: 如今，父女俩站在那里看着郁金香那清新的绿叶。

sentences.english: The relationship between a father and daughter is often simpler.
sentences.chinese: 父女之间的关系通常很简单。

sentences.english: It was a precious moment shared by father and daughter only a few weeks before Dasey was to die.
sentences.chinese: 这是父女俩在不久于人世几周之前度过的难得的时光。

sentences.english: Ep568 - Xiuqin brings Jinsheng home after he was discharged from hospital. They temporarily restore their good relationship.
sentences.chinese: 秀琴到医院接金生回家调养，父女关系暂时得到改善。

sentences.english: Daddy and daughter strives hard to open up the door to clean up the storage room.
sentences.chinese: 父女出尽“牛”力打开房门，清理杂物。

sentences.english: Researchers can’t say exactly what this means about father-daughter relationships.
sentences.chinese: 研究者们还不能准确说明这样的父女关系意味着什么。

sentences.english: Father and two eyes, silent. later that travaileth coagulation choke.
sentences.chinese: 父女二人相看泪眼，无语凝噎。

sentences.english: Call it a daddy-daughter date night.
sentences.chinese: 就叫它父女约会之夜吧。

definition: mother and child/parent and subsidiary (companies)/principal and interest
to know each other/to recognize/to identify/to acknowledge (an old relationship)
to visit new in-laws after a marriage
friends despite the difference in age
